software.name: Virtua Fighter Kids
software.Description: The Virtua Fighter family enters the next generation with a bang! Meet VF Kids! They're small, fast, and hold the secret to all 2,000 Virtua Fighter moves! With hilarious animations and sound effects, and running 20% faster than VF2, this is a must for all fight fans!

software.name: Virtua Fighter Remix
software.Description: Sega Saturn's revolutionary 3D graphics power brings the arcade action home! Punch-it out with eight polygon pummeling fighters: Jacky, Sarah, Akira, Lau, Pai, Wolf, Jeffry, and Kage. Includes all 700 butt-whoopin' moves from the arcade hit. Hear every punch, smack and bone crack in CD surround sound. Dynamic replay perspectives show every knockout blow!

software.name: Virtua Photo Studio
software.Description: Virtua Photo Studio is a Strategy game, developed by High-Tech Lab Japan and published by Acclaim Japan, which was released in Japan in 1996.

software.name: Virtual Call S
software.Description: Virtual Call S is a Strategy game, published by Kid, which was released in Japan in 1998.

software.name: Virtual Casino
software.Description:
It's Las Vegas In Your Living Room
When Lady Luck calls, you cant always drop everything and hop on the next plane to Atlantic City or Monte Carlo. Dont worry, though theres an open table waiting for you on the Virtual Casino floor. Whether your game is Black Jack, Baccarat, 7 Card Stud, Roulette or that one-arm bandit known as the Slot Machine, youll feel the excitement as the money starts to stack up. Best of all, when your luck runs out, your supply of chips wont!
You'll see and hear the flip of the cards and the clank of the coins!

software.name: Virtual Golf
software.Description: It's never been easier to play a round - Virtual Golf's realtime 3D courses, fly-by previews and spoken commentary offer a bird's eye view and professional advice for each hole. Virtual Golf allows a selection of up to 4 male and female human and computer generated characters to play a variety of game types. However, if you want to gain that all-important Professional ranking and play the Pro courses, you'll have to finish a series of tournaments under par. With zooming and panning options that allow you to view the hole from practically any angle and 6 different TV-style cameras, it's virtually better than the real thing!

software.name: Virtual Hydlide
software.Description: Action/RPG's don't get more real than this! Discover the ultimate fantasy world in this compelling epic adventure! An enchanted realm known as the Dream World has been captured an army of supernatural warriors, zombies, vampires and more infest the once peaceful land, awaiting new battles and conquests. You are a hero, born to the sword. Your mission is to free Dream World from the grip of the undead maravders by using your wits, your sword, and few magic items you uncover in your travels.

software.name: Virtual Kyoutei
software.Description: Virtual Kyoutei is a Racing game, published by Nihon Bussan, which was released in Japan in 1996.

software.name: Virtual Kyoutei 2
software.Description: Virtual Kyoutei 2 is a Sports game, published by Nihon Bussan, which was released in Japan in 1997.

software.name: Virtual Mahjong
software.Description: Virtual Mahjong is a Miscellaneous game, published by Micronet, which was released in Japan in 1998.

software.name: Virtual Mahjong II
software.Description: Virtual Mahjong II is a Miscellaneous game, published by Micronet, which was released in Japan in 1998.

software.name: Virtual On for SEGANET
software.Description: Board your Virtualoid, grab hold of your BFG Bot Blaster and prepare for war in an ultra-violent, post-modern free-for-all straight out of the arcade. It's Armageddon on your home turf as 50-foot cyborg mercenaries await your arrival in a 360-degree, polygon-perfect Arena of Doom. And the only things that can stop them from reducing you and your Virtualoid into a molten mass of twisted metal are your thumbs.
software.AKA: Virtual On for SEGANET (JP), Dennou Senki: Virtual On (JP)

software.name: Virtual Open Tennis
software.Description: Whether you're a tennis fan or not, you'll love Virtual Open Tennis! Because on clay, grass, or hard court, Virtual Open Tennis has all the power, speed, realism and excitement a sports fan could ask for! Select from 10 unique players and 3 modes of play. In-depth stats including points won, serve percent, maximum speed, service aces, slices as percent of all shots. Two simulated tournaments, instant replay, 1 to 5 set matches, and Doubles or Singles match-ups.

software.name: Virtual Volleyball
software.Description: Virtual Volleyball is a Sports game, developed by Sims and published by Imagineer, which was released in Japan in 1995.

software.name: Virtual-On: Cyber Troopers
software.Description: Board your Virtualoid, grab hold of your BFG Bot Blaster and prepare for war in an ultra-violent, post-modern free-for-all straight out of the arcade. It's Armageddon on your home turf as 50-foot cyborg mercenaries await your arrival in a 360-degree, polygon-perfect Arena of Doom. And the only things that can stop them from reducing you and your Virtualoid into a molten mass of twisted metal are your thumbs.
software.AKA: Virtual On for SEGANET (JP), Dennou Senki: Virtual On (JP)

software.name: Virus
software.Description: Virus is an Adventure game, published by Hudson, which was released in Japan in 1997.

software.name: Voice Fantasia S: Ushinawareta Voice Power
software.Description: Voice Fantasia S: Ushinawareta Voice Power is an Adventure game, developed by Japan Media Programming and published by ASK, which was released in Japan in 1997.

Release.name: Voice Fantasia S: Ushinawareta Voice Power

ReleaseImages.Image: Voice Fantasia S Ushinawareta Voice Power (JP)-310837_front.jpg

software.name: Voice Idol Maniacs: Pool Bar Story
software.Description: Voice Idol Maniacs: Pool Bar Story is a Miscellaneous game, published by Data East, which was released in Japan in 1997.

Release.name: Voice Idol Maniacs: Pool Bar Story

ReleaseImages.Image: Voice Idol Maniacs Pool Bar Story (JP)-40058_front.jpg

software.name: VR Golf '97
software.Description: It's just a game like the Green Jacket is just a sports coat. Say hello to the next generation of golf. We're talking real-time 3-D Virtual Field Vision™ that lets you play and view any lie on the course form any perspective instantly. It's interative technology that doesn't just look better, it plays better. Plus, the fast course set-up between shots means there's no waiting on this course. So gauge your distance, select your club, pick your direction and park a 300-yard drive down the middle of the fairway. Play amateur and professional tours or play up to three of your friends at the same time.

software.name: VR Soccer
software.Description: It's just a game like English soccer fans are just a little bit enthusiastic. Say hello to the next generation of soccer. We're talking real-time 3D Virtual FieldVision that puts you anywhere on the field. Play from virtually any perspective with smooth, fast camera action that gets you in the game. It's interactive technology that doesn't just look better, it plays better. Select your squad from 44 international teams and choose the position you want to play. Plus, head-to-head or alternating play modes for one or two players. VR Soccer. The difference is real.
software.AKA: Actua Soccer (JP), Actua Soccer: Club Edition (EU)

software.name: VR Virtua Racing
software.Description: You've fondled the box. You've studied the screen shots. You've even read the captions... You know about the 10 different tracks (seven more created just for Saturn drivers!). The new vehicles (yes, a Go-Kart). Grand Prix Mode (15 teams to face, five cars to race - better practice). Next generation cinematics (you definitely won't find this anywhere else!). Split-screen mode (yeeeehawww!!!)... Guess all that's left to do is buckle up and see how Saturn's twin 32-bit RISC engines perform over 300mph!

software.name: Wachenroder
software.Description: Wachenroder is a Strategy game, developed by West One and published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1998.

software.name: Waialae no Kiseki: Extra 36 Holes
software.Description: Waialae no Kiseki: Extra 36 Holes is a Sports game, published by T&E; Soft, which was released in Japan in 1997.

software.name: Waku Waku 7
software.Description: Waku Waku 7 is an Action game, developed and published by SunSoft, which was released in Japan in 1997.

software.name: Waku Waku Monster
software.Description: Waku Waku Monster is a Puzzle game, published by Altron, which was released in Japan in 1998.

software.name: Waku Waku Puyo Puyo Dungeon
software.Description: Waku Waku Puyo Puyo Dungeon is a Role-Playing game, developed by Compile and published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1998.

software.name: Wan Chai Connection
software.Description: Wan Chai Connection is an Adventure game, published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1994.

software.name: Wangan Dead Heat
software.Description: Rev up for the road race of the century! Highway 2000 delivers driving excitement with all cylinders firing! Fly through five harrowing highway courses with your choice of three high-performance racing machines - the speed and handling of the Mad Viper, the awesome acceleration of the Dark Nebula and the stick-to-the-road grip of the Rapid Fire. Slide with all four wheels into a hairpin curve. Negotiate treacherous tunnels, narrow bridges and heavy highway traffic. Challenge a fellow racer to a winner takes all split-screen barn burner! You can see the action from above, from the road or your driver's seat. It's your road! Get out onto the highway and go!

software.name: Wangan Dead Heat + Real Arrange
software.Description: Never dreamed having an expansive sportscar and an amazing babe at your side? If so this game is for you. Get the car and maybe the babe will come if you are good enough. And maybe she will let you see a little more of her... Depending on you...

software.name: Wangan Trial Love
software.Description: Wangan Trial Love is a Strategy game, published by Victor Interactive Software, which was released in Japan in 1998.

software.name: Wara^2 Wars
software.Description: Wara^2 Wars is a Strategy game, published by Shoeisha, which was released in Japan in 1997.

software.name: Warcraft II: The Dark Saga
software.Description: Command your forces in the struggle for the domination of Azeroth. Battle over land, sea and air. 52 missions: Includes Tides of Darkness and the Dark Portal expansion pack. Over 90 custom maps. Tough artificial intelligence counters your every move.

software.name: Welcome House
software.Description: Welcome House is an Adventure game, published by Imagineer, which was released in Japan in 1997.

software.name: Whizz
software.Description: ONE, TWO, THREE D! Whizz takes you into the third dimension. 3D perspective Whizz is the new generation of game that all platform addicts have been waiting for!

software.name: Willy Wombat
software.Description: Willy Wombat is an Action game, developed by West One and published by Hudson, which was released in Japan in 1997.

software.name: Wing Arms
software.Description: As a member of the WWII allied air squadron or "Wing Arm," you engage a renegade enemy force in 8 different, challenging missions. Choose your plane, scout the terrain, locate the enemy, and plot the best course of attack. Meanwhile, the enemy force has its own mission -- to shoot you out of the sky! Wing Arms is the ultimate test of air war strategy and experience.

software.name: Wing Arms: Kareinaru Gekitsui Ou
software.Description: As a member of the WWII allied air squadron or "Wing Arm," you engage a renegade enemy force in 8 different, challenging missions. Choose your plane, scout the terrain, locate the enemy, and plot the best course of attack. Meanwhile, the enemy force has its own mission -- to shoot you out of the sky! Wing Arms is the ultimate test of air war strategy and experience.

software.name: Winning Post
software.Description:
Get on Track with Winning Post!
The horses are in the gate, all bets are placed and the race is about to begin. As the owner of a top thoroughbred, years of breeding and training have come down to this race. Will your horse have what it takes to win?
The year is 1997 and horse racing has become big business in Japan. As a race horse owner, it's up to you to run a first class stable where the horses are of the highest pedigree. Hire breeders, trainers and jockeys that know their business and can help you win. Bet on the ponies, both yours and the competition to raise the cash needed to maintain your business and breed an exceptional thoroughbred. Afterall, it will take a magnificent race horse to dominate the popular races in Japan and eventually win the French Grand Prix in Paris. Horse racing is more than a sport, it's big business!
- As a thoroughbred owner, enter your horses in Japan's most popular races - Select from 240 of Japan's top races with the ultimate goal of winning the French Grand Prix in Paris - Instruct trainers, breeders and jockeys on how to maintain and race your horses - Build up your profits by placing bets on your ponies or the competition - Convenient on-screen glossary defines important horse racing terms - Compatible with the Sega Saturn Mouse (optional) - One player excitement
Review your ponies before entering a race Breed only the finest horses for the French Grand Prix Train your horses to race on 9 different tracks Full screen graphics bring the race scenes alive

software.name: Winning Post 2
software.Description: Winning Post 2 is a Sports game, published by Koei, which was released in Japan in 1996.

software.name: Winning Post 2: Final '97
software.Description: Winning Post 2: Final '97 is a Sports game, developed and published by Koei, which was released in Japan in 1997.

software.name: Winning Post 2: Program '96
software.Description: Winning Post 2: Program '96 is a Sports game, published by Koei, which was released in Japan in 1996.

software.name: Winning Post 3: Program '98
software.Description: Winning Post 3: Program '98 is a Sports game, published by Koei, which was released in Japan in 1998.

software.name: Winning Post EX
software.Description:
Get on Track with Winning Post!
The horses are in the gate, all bets are placed and the race is about to begin. As the owner of a top thoroughbred, years of breeding and training have come down to this race. Will your horse have what it takes to win?
The year is 1997 and horse racing has become big business in Japan. As a race horse owner, it's up to you to run a first class stable where the horses are of the highest pedigree. Hire breeders, trainers and jockeys that know their business and can help you win. Bet on the ponies, both yours and the competition to raise the cash needed to maintain your business and breed an exceptional thoroughbred. Afterall, it will take a magnificent race horse to dominate the popular races in Japan and eventually win the French Grand Prix in Paris. Horse racing is more than a sport, it's big business!
- As a thoroughbred owner, enter your horses in Japan's most popular races - Select from 240 of Japan's top races with the ultimate goal of winning the French Grand Prix in Paris - Instruct trainers, breeders and jockeys on how to maintain and race your horses - Build up your profits by placing bets on your ponies or the competition - Convenient on-screen glossary defines important horse racing terms - Compatible with the Sega Saturn Mouse (optional) - One player excitement
Review your ponies before entering a race Breed only the finest horses for the French Grand Prix Train your horses to race on 9 different tracks Full screen graphics bring the race scenes alive

software.name: Winter Heat
software.Description: The sequel to Athlete Kings brings your favorite characters back to compete in all the top winter sports. Converted from the arcade game but with three added Saturn exclusive events for a total of 11. From the downhill to the bobsled to the ski-jump, Winter Heat keeps a sense of humor while allowing up to four players to compete for 1st place and World Records!

software.name: Wipeout
software.Description: Experience roller coaster speed and drops, multiple 3D texture-mapped tracks, and futuristic vehicles in this out-of-control hovercraft racing game. Pick up weapons to blow your opponents off the course, or pick up shields to defend the lead.

software.name: Wipeout 2097
software.Description: The original scorched the game world and became an instant classic. Fast-forward now to a brutal new generation of anti gravity racing. Loaded with faster, smoother graphics, more tracks, more crafts, and a range of nasty new weaponry. Wipeout XL will give you the rush of your life.

software.name: Wipeout XL
software.Description: The original scorched the game world and became an instant classic. Fast-forward now to a brutal new generation of anti gravity racing. Loaded with faster, smoother graphics, more tracks, more crafts, and a range of nasty new weaponry. Wipeout XL will give you the rush of your life.

software.Description: World Advanced Daisenryaku Pack is a Miscellaneous game, published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1996.

software.name: World Advanced Daisenryaku: Kotetsu no Ikusakaze
software.Description: Get ready to trip, and we're talking hard! We're putting over 500 weapons, troops, and artillery at your command. We're loading you up with prototype hardware, sporting weaponry never before seen. We're giving you a chance to experience the first realtime 3D rendered visuals of battles ripped right from the pages of history. And, we're handing you the keys to over 50 of the most crucial confrontations in the biggest war ever fought. We'll even let you pick the country to play (Germany, Japan, or America). But, once you've picked sides, we're cutting you loose. History is in your hands. Lives are at stake. Will you champion freedom, or blow it and screw up the world forever?
software.AKA: World Advanced Daisenryaku: Kotetsu no Ikusakaze (JP)

software.name: World Cup Golf in Hyatt Dorado Beach
software.Description:
TEE-OFF TO BREATHTAKING REALISM! Two strokes down coming into the back nine and the competition is heating up. But you're a professional, playing under pressure is as easy as polishing your trophies.
Welcome to the most advanced and realistic golf game you can play (without the green fees)... Welcome to World Cup Golf Professional Edition.
- Detailed full motion video developed in Silicon Graphics Workstations. - New and easy-to-use swing interface. - Aerial flybys of each tee shot. - Full control on your stance, swing, power and backspin. - Team competition option, with a choice of 32 two-player teams. - CD quality music digitized speech of the player, caddie and commentator. - Choice of male or female and left or right-handed players. - Full control over weather and ground conditions.
3 PLAY MODES PRACTICE: Play your choice of any hole; front or back nine, or the practice course.
NORMAL: Play the course solo or in competition with 15 types of golf play including Skins, Texas Scramble and Matchplay.
TOURNAMENT: Create your own tournament against other players or computer opponents. Artificial intelligence has the computer controlled opponent(s) react to your every shot.
software.AKA: World Cup Golf in Hyatt Dorado Beach (JP)

Release.name: World Cup Golf in Hyatt Dorado Beach

ReleaseImages.Image: World Cup Golf in Hyatt Dorado Beach (JP)-39995_front.jpg
World Cup Golf in Hyatt Dorado Beach (JP)-39995_back.jpg

software.Description:
TEE-OFF TO BREATHTAKING REALISM! Two strokes down coming into the back nine and the competition is heating up. But you're a professional, playing under pressure is as easy as polishing your trophies.
Welcome to the most advanced and realistic golf game you can play (without the green fees)... Welcome to World Cup Golf Professional Edition.
- Detailed full motion video developed in Silicon Graphics Workstations. - New and easy-to-use swing interface. - Aerial flybys of each tee shot. - Full control on your stance, swing, power and backspin. - Team competition option, with a choice of 32 two-player teams. - CD quality music digitized speech of the player, caddie and commentator. - Choice of male or female and left or right-handed players. - Full control over weather and ground conditions.

software.name: World Evolution Soccer
software.Description: World Evolution Soccer is a Sports game, published by Asmik Ace Entertainment, Inc, which was released in Japan in 1997.

software.name: World Heroes Perfect
software.Description: This is the fourth installment in the World Heroes fighting game series, released in 1995. In this game, 16 figures from across history fight for the title of the world's strongest. In previous installments, the amount of time you held a button down determined the strength or weakness of an attack, but that system has been removed in this game. In addition to a more orthodox fighting-game approach that enables weak, middle and strong attacks using different buttons, this game includes new elements such as the Hero Gauge, Extra Attacks and Guard Breaker Attacks, adding an exciting new layer of strategy.

software.name: World League Soccer '98
software.Description: Sega are on the ball again to bring you World League Soccer '98. The beautiful game is recreated perfectly to the give up to four players hectic arcade action. With over two-hundred teams, fourteen stadiums and expert commentary from Peter Brackley and Ray Wilkins, you'll be as sick as a parrot if you don't pick up on this stunning new game. World League Soccer '98... You know the score.

software.name: World Series Baseball
software.Description: Step up to the plate with the premiere video game in baseball: World Series Baseball. Saturn technology delivers unbelievable color, 3D graphics and ultra-smooth perspective tracking. Enjoy incredible detail from 5 different ballpark perspectives. Swing for the fences at Fenway or another one of the game's ultra-realistic major league ballparks. Choose among play modes including 162-game pennant race, All-Star and Play-Off modes as well as a power hitter duel in Home Run Derby. Play as any one of the 28 major league teams, complete with high resolution player photos.

software.name: World Series Baseball '98
software.Description:
THE MOST AUTHENTIC GAME HAS BULKED UP.
- A New Powerful Polygonal Engine - 1997 Team, Rosters & Schedule - Play In All 30 Ballparks - Unique Batting Stances - Play By Play Commentary - Stat Tracking in 20 Sortable Categories - Pitcher Wind-ups & their Arsenal
It's the Real Thing Interleague Play Sharp New Camera Angles A View From Bank One Ballpark Superb Animation

software.name: World Series Baseball II
software.Description: Crank it out with World Series Baseball II! New features include: All 28 ballparks in rendered detail. Updated MLB stats and rosters. Play as the 1998 expansion Arizona Diamondbacks or Tampa Bay Devil Rays. Create your own expansion team roster. Awesome new camera angles. Choose from 8 players to call up from the farm.

software.name: Worldwide Soccer
software.Description: The finest teams in the world such as Brazil, The United States, Germany, France, Spain, and six other international teams prepare to volley, bicycle kick and head their way to a Championship! Sega Saturn's 3D rendered graphics put you on the field! Exhibition, World League, World Tournament, and Penalty Kick modes. 12 Dynamic playing perspectives. Bicycle kicks, volleys, flying headers and spectacular saves! Full replay control from multiple views. Complete statistical tracking.
software.AKA: International Victory Goal (EU), Sega International Victory Goal (JP), Worldwide Soccer (SA)

Release.name: Worldwide Soccer: Sega International Victory Goal Edition

software.name: Worldwide Soccer '98
software.Description: The best just got better. Now featuring national leagues and teams, as well as the international teams of the original. Other all-new features include faster gameplay, new animations and new stadiums. Commentary comes from Gary Bloom and Jack Charlton. Whether you choose to play an international cup or a club league, you can be sure that WWS98 is champion!

software.name: Worms
software.Description: Worms is an ultra-fast-paced game of team strategy for up to 16 players. It's a little bit "Lemmings™" and a lotta bit "Terminator™"... only more pink and squishy, with bazookas, homing missiles and cluster bombs blasting the screen in an unrelenting fury, only the moist can survive!

software.name: WWF In Your House
software.Description: Ten body-slamming, mat-pounding, suplex-serving, ring-wrecking WWF superstars, bringing on the killer-combo, combat carnage you crave! Experience a whole new level of hurt with hardcore super-pin finishing moves. Plus every superstar has his own personal fighting venue! With a houseful of superstar soundbites, WWF in your house is a 10-man wrecking crew... and they've got your address!

software.name: WWF Wrestlemania: The Arcade Game
software.Description: Take WWF wrestling to the extreme with intense action straight from the arcade smash! It's in-your-face mayhem with punishing head-to-head and team match-ups and grueling World and International title bouts! Pummel your senses with devastating new moves and authentic play-by-play commentary from Vince McMahon! No pain, no game!

software.name: X Japan: Virtual Shock 001
software.Description: X Japan: Virtual Shock 001 is a Miscellaneous game, published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1995.

software.name: X-Men vs. Street Fighter
software.Description: X-Men vs. Street Fighter pits Marvel's mighty mutants against Capcom's legendary fighters in a slugfest of epic proportions. Now the translation of the #1 arcade blockbuster tears into the Sega Saturn game console allowing you to perform outrageous moves and link together amazing Chain Combos. X-Men vs. Street Fighter... the collision of two explosive universes in the world's most amazing fantasy fighter!

software.name: X-Men: Children of the Atom
software.Description: X-MEN UNLEASHED! A 100% conversion of the arcade mega-hit! It's here! Ultimate combat! Mutant mayhem! X-Power! Special moves! Mid-air action! Big characters! Sizzling graphics! Exactly like you played in the arcade! You will need all your mutant powers, all your speed, all your strength... for this is the ultimate combat! Have you got enough to defeat Magneto, Omega Red and the Sentinel? Are you tough enough for Wolverine, powerful enough for Cyclops, cool enough for Iceman... are you good enough to join the new breed of mutant heroes? X-Men Children of the Atom - the fighting game to end them all!

software.name: Z
software.Description: 'Z', a place in the unknown where the shroud of death awaits in the land of the alien. Only the reactions of a space fighter at the pinnacle of his talents can negotiate a path through this futuristic challenge. Aim your blasters, cool your nerve and set forth on a flight where the aliens have surprise on their side, and you only have your lightning reflexes and will to win!

software.name: Zoop
software.Description: Level after level of brain-burning action coming at you from all sides, faster and faster until your thumbs are numb, your eyes are aching and your mind is molten. Scorching four-way action attacks you from all sides. Ninety-nine levels of intense, non-stop action shatters even the calmest of nerves! Intensifying gameplay demanding expert strategic thinking.

software.name: Zork Collection
software.Description: Zork Collection is a Miscellaneous game, published by Shoeisha, which was released in Japan in 1998.

software.name: Zork I: The Great Underground Empire
software.Description: Zork I beckons you into a world fraught with danger and discovery. Using all the cunning you can muster, you'll plunge far below the surface of the earth in search of the incomparable Treasures of Zork. But this is no mere treasure hunt. During your amazing journey you'll come face to face with creatures so outlandish they defy description. And you'll wander through an underground domain so vast, with so many twists and turns, it can offer you new surprises no matter how many times you explore it.

Release.name: Zork I: The Great Underground Empire
